attributes.additional_details:
This petition calls on the UK government to make a significant step forward for clean and healthy sport by bringing forward in legislation -

a) the criminalisation of the obtaining, using, or aiding the use of illegal performance enhancing drugs within the United Kingdom.
b) the criminalisation of travel outside the jurisdiction by citizens of the United Kingdom with the intention of obtaining, using or aiding or assisting the use of illegal performance enhancing drugs
c) the criminalisation of proving or manufacturing illegal performance enhancing drugs, knowing they are intended to enhance sporting performance illegally, or reckless as that use.
